name: communal-checklist
description: Because all those other sites my wife is trying are a pain

scripts.build: npm run compile; npm run compress
scripts.compress: cat static/browserconfig.xml | ngzip -9 > static/browserconfig.xml.gz; cat static/build.js | ngzip -9 > static/build.js.gz; cat static/favicon.ico | ngzip -9 > static/favicon.ico.gz; cat static/index.html | ngzip -9 > static/index.html.gz; cat static/manifest.json | ngzip -9 > static/manifest.json.gz; cat static/css/bootstrap.min.css | ngzip -9 > static/css/bootstrap.min.css.gz; cat static/css/font-awesome.min.css | ngzip -9 > static/css/font-awesome.min.css.gz; cat static/css/style.css | ngzip -9 > static/css/style.css.gz; cat static/fonts/FontAwesome.otf | ngzip -9 > static/fonts/FontAwesome.otf.gz; cat static/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svg | ngzip -9 > static/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.svg.gz; cat static/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf | ngzip -9 > static/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.ttf.gz; cat static/css/source-sans-pro.css | ngzip -9 > static/css/source-sans-pro.css.gz; cat static/images/creating-a-list.gif | ngzip -9 > static/images/creating-a-list.gif.gz;

author: TehShrike
